properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_QNA_REPLY WHERE ANSWER_TYPE = 2

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT ANSWER_NO , p.PRODUCT_NO , M.USER_ID , TO_CHAR(ANSWER_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') ANSWER_DATE , ANSWER_TITLE , ANSWER_STATUS FROM TB_QNA_REPLY QR LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON(QR.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(QR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE ANSWER_TYPE = 2 ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY ANSWER_NO DESC
